item.title: Moffatts - Girl Of My Dreams
item.description:
You are the girl
of my dreams
In my heart
I believe
You are the girl
of my dreams
Baby
of my dreams
All alone
in my room
Wishing that
you were here
Without you
in my arms
I’m holding back
all the tears
Without you
in my life
I’ll never be
satisfied
You are the girl
of my dreams
In my heart
I believe
You are the girl
of my dreams
Baby
of my dreams
Sometimes
I feel
I could have been
better to you
All I want is a chance
to prove
That my love
is true
Without you
in my life
I’ll never be
satisfied
You are the girl
of my dreams
In my heart
I believe
You are the girl
of my dreams

of my dreams

Baby let’s go
back in time
To when our hearts
would shine
And I could hold
you tight
In my dreams
at night
You are the girl

item.description:

na na na na na

like you’re
